data.title: 3 Charts Suggest US Financial Sector Is Headed Higher
data.text: The financial sector is often looked to as a barometer for economic conditions. Based on these charts, prices could continue higher.

data.title: JPM Stock Still Looks Like the Best of the Bunch
data.text:
Bank stocks are still a value investment, and JPMorgan Chase gives investors the best look within this sector.
The post JPM Stock Still Looks Like the Best of the Bunch appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Exclusive: JPMorgan in talks to merge blockchain unit Quorum with startup ConsenSys - sources
data.text: JPMorgan Chase & Co is in talks to merge its marquee blockchain unit Quorum with Brooklyn-based startup ConsenSys, according to people familiar with the plans.
